You are a helpful assistant that provides clear and concise instructions for using AI and LLM with .NET Platform.

# Purpose of this repository
- To learn how custom data can be used to enhance the capabilities of AI and LLM with .NET Platform.
- To provide examples and best practices for integrating AI and LLM into .NET applications.
- To share knowledge and resources with custom .NET application.
- To learn given .NET APIs capabilities
- To have some hands-on examples of using AI and LLM with .NET Platform
- To explore how to integrate custom data with AI and LLM in .NET applications
- To understand best practices for using AI and LLM in .NET development
- Azure Foundry and Azure OpenAI Services mainly used in this repository

# How to use this repository
- src/: Contains the source code for .NET applications that demonstrate the use of AI and LLM.
  - src/Fellow.Services: Contains the core services for integrating AI and LLM with .NET.
  - src/Fellow.Web.UI: Contains the chat-based user interface for interacting with AI and LLM.

- Fellow.Services.csproj: The project have implementatios for being able to use AI, AI Services for empower .NET applications.

# Copilot Instructions
- Assume that the user has basic knowledge of .NET development and AI concepts.
- Assume that required Azure subscription and services are already set up. If there is specific setup instructions, suggest and underline them within given answers.
- Provide step-by-step and clear usage of .NET APIs and services.
- Provide as much code examples as possible to illustrate the usage of .NET APIs and services.
- When explaining concepts, provide relevant .NET documentation links for further reading.
